koohiiStory1: Many men, before they commence their relationship with the woman of their desires, place her on something of a pedestal, which often leads to disappointment later on.
koohiiStory2: If you want to commence a relationship, just put a woman on a pedestal and she´ll love ya forever.
kunYomi: はじ.める、-はじ.める、はじ.まる
myStory: bắt đầu. khởi đầu. người phụ nữ đài loan
readingExamples: 始まる (はじ.まる), 始める (はじ.める)
words:
始発(しはつ): first train
始末(しまつ): management, dealing, settlement, cleaning up afterwards
終始(しゅうし): beginning and end, from beginning to end, doing a thing from beginning to end
始め(はじめ): beginning, start, origin
始めまして(はじめまして): How do you do?, I am glad to meet you
開始(かいし): start, commencement, beginning
原始(げんし): origin, primeval
始終(しじゅう): continuously, from beginning to end
始まり(はじまり): origin, beginning
始めに(はじめに): in the beginning, to begin with, first of all
始める(はじめる): begin
始まる(はじまる): begin
